trans-unit.source: Determines how the source color in a copy pixel operation is combined with the destination color to result in a final color.
trans-unit.target: 确定复制像素操作中的源颜色如何与目标颜色组合生成最终颜色。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation> enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation>枚举由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>类。

trans-unit.source: The destination area is filled by using the color associated with index 0 in the physical palette.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用物理调色板中与索引 0 关联的颜色来填充目标区域。

trans-unit.source: (This color is black for the default physical palette.)
trans-unit.target: （对于默认的物理调色板，该颜色为黑色。）

trans-unit.source: Windows that are layered on top of your window are included in the resulting image.
trans-unit.target: 生成的图像中包含您的窗口上层叠的那些窗口。

trans-unit.source: By default, the image contains only your window.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该图像仅包含您的窗口。

trans-unit.source: Note that this generally cannot be used for printing device contexts.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这通常无法用于打印设备上下文。

trans-unit.source: The destination area is inverted.
trans-unit.target: 目标区域已逆转。

trans-unit.source: The colors of the source area are merged with the colors of the selected brush of the destination device context using the Boolean <see langword="AND" /> operator.
trans-unit.target: 使用布尔运算符 <see langword="AND" /> 将源区域的颜色与目标设备上下文的所选定画笔的颜色合并。

trans-unit.source: The colors of the inverted source area are merged with the colors of the destination area by using the Boolean <see langword="OR" /> operator.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用布尔运算符 <see langword="OR" /> 将已逆转的源区域的颜色与目标区域的颜色合并。

trans-unit.source: The bitmap is not mirrored.
trans-unit.target: 位图未映射。

trans-unit.source: The inverted source area is copied to the destination.
trans-unit.target: 逆转的源区域已复制到目标。

trans-unit.source: The source and destination colors are combined using the Boolean <see langword="OR" /> operator, and then resultant color is then inverted.
trans-unit.target: 使用布尔运算符 <see langword="OR" /> 组合源颜色和目标颜色，然后逆转生成的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The brush currently selected in the destination device context is copied to the destination bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 目标设备上下文中当前选定的画笔被复制到目标位图。

trans-unit.source: The colors of the brush currently selected in the destination device context are combined with the colors of the destination are using the Boolean <see langword="XOR" /> operator.
trans-unit.target: 使用布尔运算符 <see langword="XOR" /> 将目标设备上下文中当前选定的画笔颜色与目标的颜色组合。

trans-unit.source: The colors of the brush currently selected in the destination device context are combined with the colors of the inverted source area using the Boolean <see langword="OR" /> operator.
trans-unit.target: 使用布尔运算符 <see langword="OR" /> 将目标设备上下文中当前选定的画笔颜色与已逆转的源区域的颜色组合。

trans-unit.source: The result of this operation is combined with the colors of the destination area using the Boolean <see langword="OR" /> operator.
trans-unit.target: 使用布尔运算符 <see langword="OR" /> 将该运算的结果与目标区域的颜色组合。

trans-unit.source: The colors of the source and destination areas are combined using the Boolean <see langword="AND" /> operator.
trans-unit.target: 使用布尔运算符 <see langword="AND" /> 将源区域与目标区域的颜色组合。

trans-unit.source: The source area is copied directly to the destination area.
trans-unit.target: 源区域已直接复制到目标区域。

trans-unit.source: The inverted colors of the destination area are combined with the colors of the source area using the Boolean <see langword="AND" /> operator.
trans-unit.target: 使用布尔运算符 <see langword="AND" /> 将目标区域的逆转后的颜色与源区域的颜色组合。

trans-unit.source: The colors of the source and destination areas are combined using the Boolean <see langword="XOR" /> operator.
trans-unit.target: 使用布尔运算符 <see langword="XOR" /> 将源区域与目标区域的颜色组合。

trans-unit.source: The colors of the source and destination areas are combined using the Boolean <see langword="OR" /> operator.
trans-unit.target: 使用布尔运算符 <see langword="OR" /> 将源区域与目标区域的颜色组合。

trans-unit.source: The destination area is filled by using the color associated with index 1 in the physical palette.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用物理调色板中与索引 1 关联的颜色来填充目标区域。

trans-unit.source: (This color is white for the default physical palette.)
trans-unit.target: （对于默认的物理调色板，该颜色为白色。）
